mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO COMMU_UP_DATA_PMS ( ID, CAT_NO, MAC_NO, COMMUNICATION_KEY, COMMUNICATION_VALUE, COMMUNICATION_TIME, COMPANY_ID, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{catNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{macNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communicationKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communicationValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{communicationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_COMMU_UP_DATA_PMS.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE COMMU_UP_DATA_PMS
CAT_NO = #{catNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAC_NO = #{macNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMUNICATION_KEY = #{communicationKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMUNICATION_VALUE = #{communicationValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
COMMUNICATION_TIME = #{communicationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
